section.name: Enterprise Java (605.784.31) Root
section.p:
This is the course home page for the Enterprise Java Course (605.784), taught at John's Hopkins University, Engineering Programs for Professionals.
This site will be populated as the semester progresses and topics are addressed. If you are looking for a version of the full content for ejava-javaee, refer to
http://webdev.apl.jhu.edu/~jcs/legacy-ejava-javaee.

ul.li: register for newsgroup and setup e-mail handling (all e-mails will have ejava_class in subject)
post at least 1 test message to newsgroup
setup development environment by going through exercises 0 and 1
